title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. III, subch. C, art. 2 - Truck Mileage Tax
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. III, subch. C, art. 2 - Truck Mileage Tax

State Regulations

Part 480 - Liability For Tax (§ 480.1)

Part 481 - Computation Of Tax (§ 481.1 to 481.12)

Part 482 - Exemptions (§ 482.1)

Part 483 - Records (§ 483.1 to 483.7)

Part 484 - Returns And Payment Of Tax (§ 484.1 to 484.11)

Part 485 - Revision Of Returns And Judicial Review (§ 485.1 to 485.3)

Part 486 - Tax Lien And Bonds (§ 486.1 to 486.3)

Part 487 - Collection And Refund Of Taxes (§ 487.1 to 487.4)

Part 488 - Civil Penalties And Interest On Underpayments (§ 488.1 to 488.6)

Part 489 - Repealed

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. III, subch. C, art. 2

The provisions of this Article are not applicable to the

Fuel Use Tax imposed under article 21-A of the Tax Law, effective January 1, 1996. This Article does not reflect certain amendments made to article 21 of
such law. State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
